hero.heading: Support Rohingya Refugees in Cox's Bazar, Bangladesh
hero.paragraph: Join us in making a difference for the Rohingya by contributing to our education, medical treatment, food, shelter, and clean water programs.

sections.title: Our mission
sections.description: To alleviate the suffering of the Rohingya genocide survivors confined to the world's largest refugee camp in Cox's Bazar, Bangladesh.

sections.title: Our action
sections.description: Digging wells, building shelters, paying for medical treatments, and educating children.

sections.title: Get involved
sections.description: Help us create a better life for the heavily persecuted Rohingya by supporting our cause.
